Oleh kerana syak wasangka serta cemburu yang keterlaluan Datuk Johan telah membunuh kedua-dua adik beradik tersebut tanpa usul periksa dan akhirnya Datuk Johan juga meninggal dunia akibat dicekik oleh hantu isterinya

programme.title: Spides Ep4
programme.desc: Nora tidak yakin adiknya sudah mati. Bersama Marie, Peter dan Finn, mereka pergi ke tanah perkuburan pada waktu malam untuk mengetahui dengan pasti. Mereka menggali kubur Sara dan di dalam keranda mereka menemui sebuah anak patung. Sara masih hidup! Malah, dia telah memerhati kumpulan dari jauh.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: Apabila terowong berusia sepuluh tahun ditetapkan untuk selesai mengalami pelarasan geologi di seluruh dunia, urutan kegagalan geologi termasuk rekahan lantai, gempa bumi, tanah runtuh, runtuh lumpur dan sebagainya akan datang. Terowong dan seluruh negara dipertaruhkan. Lao Hong dan Xiao Hong, ayah dan anak lelaki itu berdiri dalam keadaan terdesak. Bagaimanakah mereka terselamat daripada krisis hidup-dan-mati ini dengan 160,000 rakyat?

programme.title: Bayi Tabung
programme.desc: Setelah mengharungi satu peristiwa yang menghimpit kehidupan, Jelina ditawarkan untuk menyewakan rahimnya dengan bayaran tinggi oleh sepasang suami isteri dari Malaysia yang tidak punya anak secara biasa. Tawaran harga yang tinggi membuatkan Jelina bersetuju untuk menerima titipan embrio itu sehingga lahir. Setelah bayi itu lahir timbul pula satu masalah kerana Jelina merasa bahawa bayi itu adalah darah dagingnya.

programme.title: Rentak Desa
programme.desc: Pencemaran alam menyebabkan penduduk kampung mula menunjuk perasaan. Mat Desa dan Wairah seringkali berasa bahawa penduduk di situ hanya hidup atas empati pemaju. Hanya kerana ingin membuat jalan raya, bukit dan pokok ditebang manakala sungai dicemari sisa bahan toksik - menyebabkan ikan mati dan beracun. Sebuah penemuan merungkai segalanya.

programme.title: Dewi Cinta
programme.desc: Patah hati kerana teman lelakinya curang, Dewi cuba untuk membunuh diri. Sebelum terlambat, Dewi segera menyedari bahawa usahanya itu hanyalah sia-sia. Dia bertemu dengan Arman lalu mereka berdua jatuh cinta dan menjalinkan hubungan. Bekas teman lelaki Dewi, Micky muncul kembali menagih cinta darinya kerana masih tidak boleh melupakan Dewi. Pilihan terpaksa dibuat antara Arman atau Micky.

programme.title: Simfoni Duniaku
programme.desc: Iskandar, pemuda yang suka berfoya-foya akhirnya merasai kebahagiaan alam percintaan. Perkenalannya bersama Zuraida telah membuatkan dia jatuh cinta. Namun, terpaksa berdepan rintangan apabila Iskandar telah dijodohkan bersama anak perempuan kepada rakan niaga bapanya. Liku-liku percintaan dan tentangan terpaksa dihadapi oleh dua pasangan bercinta.

programme.title: Memori
programme.desc: Seorang Dato yang berpengaruh bersama dua orang anaknya yang mempunyai masalah tersendiri. Anak perempuannya bergelut dengan dunia dadah manakala anak lelakinya terlampau menyukai dunia permotoran sehingga obses akan perkara itu. Kehilangan bapa mereka akhirnya menimbulkan rasa sesal dalam diri mereka.

programme.title: Permintaan Terakhir
programme.desc: Salina terpaksa menjalani kehidupan baharu setelah ibunya berkahwin dengan bapa kepada Rohani yang merupakan musuh Salina di sekolah. Salina terpaksa mencari jalan untuk mendapat perhatian keluarganya. Keadaan ini berlanjutan sehingga dia mendapat tahu dirinya menghidap penyakit barah otak. Salina merahsiakan perkara ini daripada keluarganya, namun ia terbongkar setelah Rohani terdengar doa yang dibaca Salina.

programme.title: Tuan Besar
programme.desc: Tuan Wahid sering menggunakan darjat untuk bersikap kasar dengan pekerjanya dan mengambil kesempatan terhadap Rokiah. Rokiah, seorang janda mempunyai anak bernama Jamilah. Jamil, anak Tuan Wahid pula jatuh cinta dengan Jamilah. Ini menimbulkan konflik antara mereka berdua lalu datang Tuan Besar untuk menyelesaikan konflik itu.

programme.title: Suara Kekasih
programme.desc: Percintaan yang ditentang keluarga kerana perbezaan darjat membuatkan Ayu dan Taufiq terpaksa membawa haluan berbeza. Ayu, penyanyi di kelab malam jatuh cinta dengan Taufiq, pengurus syarikat insuran yang berasal dari keluarga kaya. Ditentang oleh ibu Taufiq, mereka merasakan restu keluarga amat penting dan terpaksa membuat keputusan penting untuk masa depan mereka.

programme.title: Bayi Tabung
programme.desc: Setelah mengharungi satu peristiwa yang menghimpit kehidupan, Jelina ditawarkan untuk menyewakan rahimnya dengan bayaran tinggi oleh sepasang suami isteri dari Malaysia yang tidak punya anak secara biasa. Tawaran harga yang tinggi membuatkan Jelina bersetuju untuk menerima titipan embrio itu sehingga lahir. Setelah bayi itu lahir timbul pula satu masalah kerana Jelina merasa bahawa bayi itu adalah darah dagingnya.

programme.title: Bayangan Cinta
programme.desc: Pertemuan dua bekas kekasih, Auzy dan Akhbar selepas 18 tahun membangkitkan perasaan lama. Walau perasaan cinta masih kuat, hubungan mereka tidak dapat diteruskan kerana Akhbar sudah pun berkahwin. Suratan takdir mengatakan sebaliknya apabila Auzy kini mengajar anak kepada Akhbar, Andy.

programme.title: Dewi Cinta
programme.desc: Patah hati kerana teman lelakinya curang, Dewi cuba untuk membunuh diri. Sebelum terlambat, Dewi segera menyedari bahawa usahanya itu hanyalah sia-sia. Dia bertemu dengan Arman lalu mereka berdua jatuh cinta dan menjalinkan hubungan. Bekas teman lelaki Dewi, Micky muncul kembali menagih cinta darinya kerana masih tidak boleh melupakan Dewi. Pilihan terpaksa dibuat antara Arman atau Micky.

programme.title: Permintaan Terakhir
programme.desc: Salina terpaksa menjalani kehidupan baharu setelah ibunya berkahwin dengan bapa kepada Rohani yang merupakan musuh Salina di sekolah. Salina terpaksa mencari jalan untuk mendapat perhatian keluarganya. Keadaan ini berlanjutan sehingga dia mendapat tahu dirinya menghidap penyakit barah otak. Salina merahsiakan perkara ini daripada keluarganya, namun ia terbongkar setelah Rohani terdengar doa yang dibaca Salina.

programme.title: Simfoni Duniaku
programme.desc: Iskandar, pemuda yang suka berfoya-foya akhirnya merasai kebahagiaan alam percintaan. Perkenalannya bersama Zuraida telah membuatkan dia jatuh cinta. Namun, terpaksa berdepan rintangan apabila Iskandar telah dijodohkan bersama anak perempuan kepada rakan niaga bapanya. Liku-liku percintaan dan tentangan terpaksa dihadapi oleh dua pasangan bercinta.

programme.title: Ali Setan
programme.desc: Ali pelajar universiti yang nakal dan suka bergurau berjumpa Asmidar ketika dalam perjalanan ke universiti. Ali selalu mencari jalan untuk mengusik Asmidar, lama kelamaan perasaan cinta mula berputik antara mereka berdua. Konflik mula terjadi apabila Ali sebenarnya sudah berkahwin dengan Tipah namun atas sebab terpaksa.

programme.title: Tuan Besar
programme.desc: Tuan Wahid sering menggunakan darjat untuk bersikap kasar dengan pekerjanya dan mengambil kesempatan terhadap Rokiah. Rokiah, seorang janda mempunyai anak bernama Jamilah. Jamil, anak Tuan Wahid pula jatuh cinta dengan Jamilah. Ini menimbulkan konflik antara mereka berdua lalu datang Tuan Besar untuk menyelesaikan konflik itu.

programme.title: Rentak Desa
programme.desc: Pencemaran alam menyebabkan penduduk kampung mula menunjuk perasaan. Mat Desa dan Wairah seringkali berasa bahawa penduduk di situ hanya hidup atas empati pemaju. Hanya kerana ingin membuat jalan raya, bukit dan pokok ditebang manakala sungai dicemari sisa bahan toksik - menyebabkan ikan mati dan beracun. Sebuah penemuan merungkai segalanya.

programme.title: Bintang Malam
programme.desc: Selepas dua belas tahun berlayar, Yazid dan Johari akhirnya pulang semula ke tanah air. Yazid pulang ke kampung manakala Johari pergi ke Kuala Lumpur dan bertemu Haslinda, Shima dan Aida. Bersimpati dengan nasib Haslinda, Johari ingin membantunya. Yazid pula keluar mencari Aisah di bandar - tetapi berdepan dengan pelbagai konflik dan tragedi.

programme.title: Ceritaku Ceritamu
programme.desc: Gadis kampung yang memasang cita-cita tinggi untuk mencari pekerjaan di ibu kota. Berpengetahuan dalam bidang fesyen, dia ingin membina masa depan yang lebih cerah buatnya. Setelah berhijrah, Hasnah/Ana bertemu seorang lelaki dan menjalin hubungan bersamanya - namun dia sudah berkahwin dan mempunyai anak sebaya dengannya.

programme.title: Memori
programme.desc: Seorang Dato yang berpengaruh bersama dua orang anaknya yang mempunyai masalah tersendiri. Anak perempuannya bergelut dengan dunia dadah manakala anak lelakinya terlampau menyukai dunia permotoran sehingga obses akan perkara itu. Kehilangan bapa mereka akhirnya menimbulkan rasa sesal dalam diri mereka.

Ditentang oleh ibu Taufiq, mereka merasakan restu keluarga amat penting dan terpaksa membuat keputusan penting untuk masa depan mereka.

programme.title: Bayi Tabung
programme.desc: Setelah mengharungi satu peristiwa yang menghimpit kehidupan, Jelina ditawarkan untuk menyewakan rahimnya dengan bayaran tinggi oleh sepasang suami isteri dari Malaysia yang tidak punya anak secara biasa. programme.title: Bukan Orang Buta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuzik jalanan (busker) yang berbakat tetapi tidak diberi perhatian orang ramai telah menukar strateginya untuk menyamar sebagai seorang busker buta. Penyamarannya mula menarik perhatian ramai dan berjaya dilamar oleh sebuah syarikat muzik terkemuka. Walau bagaimanapun beliau perasan bahawa syarikat tersebut mempunyai agenda dan konspirasi jahat yang cuba dilakukan oleh seorang wanita yang juga pemilik syarikat muzik terkemuka tersebut. programme.title: Gadis Penjual Sayur Yang Sukses Menjadi Pengusaha Sayur & Buah Online
programme.desc: Nana tinggal bersama ibu dan neneknya. Dia hidup miskin dan terpaksa menjual sayur-sayuran untuk mencari rezeki. Di antara kajian, Nana akan menggunakan masa untuk menjual. Ternyata ibunya, Yuni, sedang mengumpul dana perniagaan daripada penduduk bertopengkan pelaburan, dan dia sering mengadu tentang penipuan pelaburan. Adakah kehidupan Nana akan berubah? Adakah ibunya akan segera sedar dan bertaubat?

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep48
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021 Ep4
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.

programme.title: Cinta Misteri Ep33
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep35
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep82
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Bocah Pengupas Kulit Kerang Jadi Pengusaha Kerajinan Sukses
programme.desc: Pada usia muda, Sasa rajin membantu ibunya mengupas kerang. Begitulah keperluan mereka dipenuhi, lebih-lebih lagi Sasa adalah anak yatim piatu. Oleh itu Sasa dan ibunya berjuang untuk terus hidup.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep71
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Jejak Misteri Ep10
programme.desc: Jejak Misteri ialah sebuah rancangan realiti bergenre misteri di mana setiap episod menyajikan liputan pelbagai tempat, bangunan dan tapak bersejarah yang bukan sahaja menyimpan kisah-kisah bersejarah, malah turut meninggalkan kisah-kisah mistik.

programme.title: Di Sebelah Ada Surga Ep10
programme.desc: Di Sebelah Ada Surga menceritakan tentang 3 pemuda iaitu Andika, Gading, dan Uus. Kehidupan rohaniah mereka dikatakan masih kurang. Masa muda mereka telah diisikan dengan santai tanpa mempedulikan masa depan. Mereka sibuk mengejar keseronokan duniawi yang tipikal dari golongan belia hari ini.

programme.title: Bocah Pengupas Kulit Kerang Jadi Pengusaha Kerajinan Sukses
programme.desc: Pada usia muda, Sasa rajin membantu ibunya mengupas kerang. Begitulah keperluan mereka dipenuhi, lebih-lebih lagi Sasa adalah anak yatim piatu. Oleh itu Sasa dan ibunya berjuang untuk terus hidup.

programme.title: Bridesmaid Barbar Curi Perhatian Di Nikahan Orang
programme.desc: Pinky yang tomboi terpaksa berpakaian feminin untuk menjadi pengiring pengantin perempuan di majlis perkahwinan sepupunya, Bunga. Apa yang berlaku jika pengiring pengantin lebih cantik daripada pengantin perempuan? Itulah yang terjadi pada Pinky yang mencuri perhatian di majlis perkahwinan dan membuatkan Bagas terpesona dengan Pinky.

programme.title: Semakin Aku Menderita, Semakin Bahagia Suamiku
programme.desc: Ayah Listy tidak sengaja melanggar isteri Adam, Santy yang sedang mengandung. Namun selepas menangkap seseorang, Adam tahu siapa yang melanggar isteri kesayangannya. Dia mengekori orang yang melanggar isterinya dan rupa-rupanya orang itu mempunyai seorang anak perempuan, Listy. Adam yang masih berdendam, sengaja mendekati dan mengahwini Listy sebagai cara untuk membalas dendam kepada ayahnya.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep82
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Pop Academy Ep19
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.title: The Sultan Ep31
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep59
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep83

programme.desc: Berminat dengan pembantu peribadi tidak salah, lebih-lebih lagi jika anda mempunyai pengawal peribadi seperti Jaka. Dia kaya, kacak, baik hati, dan pandai buat kerja rumah juga!

programme.title: Janji Gak Naksir ART
programme.desc: Berminat dengan pembantu peribadi tidak salah, lebih-lebih lagi jika anda mempunyai pengawal peribadi seperti Jaka. Dia kaya, kacak, baik hati, dan pandai buat kerja rumah juga!

programme.title: Habis Married Godaan Datang, Semoga Kuat Yagesyah
programme.desc: Rachel menganggap perjalanan perkahwinannya lancar seperti dalam kisah dongeng. Banyak godaan yang menimpa perkahwinan Rachel dan Nathan, menyebabkan mereka bergaduh dan salah faham antara satu sama lain, tetapi mampukah perkahwinan mereka bertahan?

programme.title: Gadis Penjual Sayur Yang Sukses Menjadi Pengusaha Sayur & Buah Online
programme.desc: Nana tinggal bersama ibu dan neneknya. Dia hidup miskin dan terpaksa menjual sayur-sayuran untuk mencari rezeki. Di antara kajian, Nana akan menggunakan masa untuk menjual. Ternyata ibunya, Yuni, sedang mengumpul dana perniagaan daripada penduduk bertopengkan pelaburan, dan dia sering mengadu tentang penipuan pelaburan. Adakah kehidupan Nana akan berubah? Adakah ibunya akan segera sedar dan bertaubat?

programme.desc: Nikmati keseronokan bersama dengan menyanyi dan bergoyang di Konser Hepi Sampai Pagi bersama barisan bintang terkenal dan hos yang mengujakan.

programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Sungguh Sulit Untuk Di Skip
programme.desc: Ririn berasa jengkel kerana Udin dan teman wanitanya beratur untuk memohon kerja. Akibatnya, Ririn tidak diterima di syarikat itu. Ririn keliru bagaimana untuk bertahan. Dia berpura-pura menjadi isteri Udin di hadapan ibunya dan sebaliknya dibawa ke kampung halaman Udin.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV Ep9
programme.desc: SCTV ke-32 tahun menghiburkan rakyat Indonesia. Dalam sambutan ulang tahun SCTV yang ke-32 pada tahun ini, SCTV mempersembahkan pelbagai hiburan yang menyeronokkan dan bermutu tinggi.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep919920
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ Lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep29162917
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.desc: As an ordinary girl, working an ordinary job, at an ordinary convenience store, Lin An An had only one dream in life: to find a good, stable, government job so she could support her aging grandfather. With that single dream in mind, An An never even thought of becoming anything more than the ordinary girl she had always been. But all that changed the day You Yuan Le walked into her life.

programme.title: Taichung Player (M) Ep89
programme.desc: Chin-Lan Chang & Top Social Media Infulencer travel & explore Taichong!

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep37
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1031
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep876
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep800801
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting Live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep654
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep433
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep23
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each other’s back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Jungle
programme.desc: A vicious killer goes around challenging and killing top refined martial arts masters. When convicted killer and kung fu expert Hahou Mo hears of this, he offers to help the police capture the killer in exchange for his freedom. Can he really help?

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Based on real events, the movie follows the footsteps of the fans of Hong Kong Canto-pop diva Anita Mui. After the death of the popstar, fans from different walks of life risk arrest to track down handwritten cards, letters and other possessions from Anita Mui to preserve their idol’s memory.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the world’s best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the world’s top detective got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun…

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Our Time Will Come
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation of Hong Kong, Fan Lan accidentally helps to rescue the writer Mao Dun and is recruited to join the anti-Japanese guerrilla. In order to protect Fan Lan, her mother takes Fan Lan’s place to relay military intelligence but was arrested. Fan Lan must now seek help from her ex-boyfriend who works for the Japanese…

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: This movie is inspired by the true story of real-life hero Huo Yuan Jia. When a fight destroys the reputation of this renowned martial arts champion along with the lives of his family, Huo’s path to redemption brings him face-to-face with the most ferocious opponents in the world.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The “passion choir pilot program” trains students from three underperforming schools’ choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the “passion choir” and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: The Golden Monk
programme.desc: A monk realizes he is the reincarnation of Golden Child who was cast down from heaven to experience life and death a hundred times, as he broke a sacred rule by falling in love with a fairy, Jade. While his memories are erased, Jade refuses to forget their love and accumulates goodwill over a hundred reincarnations to end Golden Child’s suffering.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Choi’s actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: My Alien Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Angela arrives from another planet in search of her brother, fate has her unexpectedly meet handsome veterinarian Tian Yi, who risks himself to save her every time she gets into trouble. Though she is no believer of love, his actions eventually move her…

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Cloud’s successor as the city’s guard.

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face life’s mounting hardships.

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man’s matchless fighting skills are revered all over China. Set during the Sino-Japanese War, Ip Man is forced to leave his home and work to support his family. With only his martial arts skills, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: The Bullet Vanishes
programme.desc: A murder case which the bullet seems to disappear. A detective and his partner start the investigation that revolves around the questions of “Is shooting without bullets possible? How can a bullet disappear upon contact with a body?”

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a guy whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, things starts to stir up in the show biz. "Lucky Star 2015" is a hilarious comedy starring actors from both Hong Kong and Taiwan, including Eric Tsang, Dada Chan and Wong Cho Lam.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find “the-one”?

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung is a fearless fighter who aligns himself with one of the two gang leaders ruling Guangzhou. However, there is more to the young Wong Fei Hung than meets the eye as he has a more dangerous agenda in mind.

programme.title: Hello Mr. Billionaire
programme.desc: An incompetent soccer goalkeeper for a minor league suddenly inherits thirty billion yuan in this mind-boggling comedy. In order to get the full amount, he must first spend one billion yuan on himself in a month without telling anyone about the task, and is also not allowed to own any assets at the end of it.

programme.title: Painted Faces
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life story of Master Yu Jim Yuen who strives to run his academy in the 1960s, even as the opera culture is declining. Three young men, Sammo Hung, Jackie Chan and Yuen Biao, are determined to train under Master Yu and undergo extremely tough training before they become three of Hong Kong’s biggest stars

programme.title: Love is…Pyjamas
programme.desc: Underwear designer Spring and her daughter work at Hugo’s enterprise. Hugo demands a new fashion line design competition between Spring and the newly employed ex model Jojo to save his company from bankruptcy and the winner will take charge of the line. Who will win the competition and will Hugo’s enterprise be saved?

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963, and ruthlessly carved an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other’s parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents’ first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderella’s adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: Wine War
programme.desc: A Chinese wine expert residing in France is contacted by his childhood buddy in China to help him bid for a famous bottle of vintage wine in an auction. Little did he realize he is about to enter an age-old feud between rivaling vineyards and discover a historical mystery that might shatter the whole wine industry.

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman.
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy about a quarrelsome and loving couple whose spirits are being swapped over after a thunderstorm. The sexy lady finds herself carrying an ugly man’s spirit, and vice versa. Can they switch their spirits back, or do they need to get use to the situation for the rest of their lives?

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80’s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition – to live the American dream.

programme.title: The Lady Professional
programme.desc: Lily Ho is perfectly cast as a gun-for-hire who always gets her man - in more ways than one! The cast and crew shot on location in Japanese scenic spots such as Mount Fuji; and there are plenty of over-the-top thrills, as Lily even masquerades as a nun.

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. One year later, when he sends for Li, her poor health cannot stand the arduous journey and she arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Chik, one of the assassins of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to leave the clan when a kind family saved him. When pursued by the clan, a swordsman whose wife was killed by him saved his life. They decide to jointly take revenge on the clan.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bill’s nieces!

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: In The Sword And The Lute, Kwei Wu (Jimmy Wang Yu) and his partner (Chin Ping) are on a mission to destroy the "Phoenix Lute", a deadly weapon that shoots poisonous needles up to 500 paces and which can only be destroyed by the Kan curved sword...

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his master’s rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gao’s betrayal…

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: This wuxia murder mystery film talks about a young girl whose father was ruthlessly murdered during China's early republican era. She has a list of villains who have been plotting against her father and together with her elder brother, the young girl sets out on a journey to hunt down the secret serial killer.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon’s clutches.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best. It's not so much the plot - a master swordsman protects a treasure chest on a dangerous journey - that makes this great, but what Sun does with it, inspiring the cast and crew to some of their finest work.

programme.title: The Jade Raksha
programme.desc: A fearsome swordswoman known as The Jade Raksha appears in the martial arts world and begins killing people whose surname is Yan. A swordsman figures out who she is and asks her why. Apparently a Yan killed her family 18 years ago and she only has vengeance on her mind…

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her family’s objection, so Hong’s maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Young Vagabond
programme.desc: It's a fact: the greatest martial arts movie character is Huang Fei-hung. But it's quite possible the second greatest character is "Beggar Su", one of the famous Ten Kwangtung Tigers, and a legendary Ching Dynasty figure. Little known director Liu Shih-yu decided to fill his telling of the character's life story with the best kung-fu actors Shaw Studios had to offer. He reunited the stars of Liu Chia-liang's landmark Dirty Ho -- Gordon Liu Chia-hui, Wang Yu, and Wang Lung-wei--added such other greats as multi-award-winning Ku Feng and Pai Piao, then gave workhorse Lo Chiang his shot as choreographer. Together they made a rare, colorful, action-packed adventure as Beggar Su and his brother train incessantly to defeat the brutally powerful thief called Centipede. Finally, after much death and destruction, Gordon Liu Chia-hui and Wang Lung-wei get a memorable rematch to follow their classic masterpieces in Dirty Ho and Martial Club. The result is not only reminiscent of preeminent director Liu Chia-liang's work, but essentially an homage to him as well!

programme.title: When The Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: Beyond The Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun’s warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: Purple Darts
programme.desc: A girl vows to take revenge for her parents who were murdered by four outlaws when she was only a baby. To do so, she trains hard at martial arts and teams up with a swordsman and a couple to finally kill them all.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: Pursuit Of Vengeance
programme.desc: Kung Fu legend Ti Lung stars in the action movie as Fu Xue Hong, embarking on a epic journey of revenge for his father.

programme.title: The Pure And The Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang’s fiancé and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him…

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couple’s brothel.

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern – an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all…

programme.title: Lady Of The Law
programme.desc: Chan, the chief of Wan Sheng Escort, is forced to raise his opponent’s son, Yim. While Chan forbids Yim to practice martial arts, Yim secretly learns it. Ten years later, a rapist appears and Yim is arrested by a lady constable as the suspect. The rapist turns out to be Chan’s elder son and Yim is framed by the Chans. Can Yim prove his innocence?

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Martial Arts Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers’ death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Gang Master
programme.desc: This is a story about an army out to destroy the Hsien Lung gang of anti-Yuan revolutionaries. Their leader Ru Yi Tu is up against Fu Zhong Yuan, the identified successor of the Hsien Lung gang who must also prove his own legitimacy. The plot thickens with murder, sibling rivalry and shocking discoveries that could change the course of history.

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards’ heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: Village Of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: Holy Flame Of The Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: Arasangam
programme.desc: Arivarasu goes to Canada to search for his missing brother-in-law. However, he discovers a plot by terrorists to kill all intellectuals in India and stop the country's growth.

programme.title: Dikkilona
programme.desc: When Mani, a lineworker who is unhappy in his marriage, manages to make a time machine work due to an accident, he goes back in time to change his life.

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Kodi, a 'Saamiyaadi' by profession, takes the responsibility of saving his sister and brother-in-law who is against Villangam and Adhigaaram, from their anger and retaliation.

programme.title: Kamali From Nadukaveri
programme.desc: Kamali, a young woman, strives hard to land a seat in a prestigious educational institute. Her journey soon inspires others from her small village to follow in her footsteps.

programme.title: Kadaisi Nodigal (Forensic)
programme.desc: When a psychotic murderer sets out on a killing spree, a medico-legal advisor uses his forensic skills to unravel the truth behind the heinous deeds.

programme.title: Dangal
programme.desc: After his failure at winning a gold medal for the country, Mahavir Phogat vows to realise his dreams by training his daughters for the Commonwealth Games despite societal pressures.

programme.title: Achamindri
programme.desc: Sakthi, a pickpocket, and Sathya, a police officer, must work together to find out who is responsible for a series of deaths and bring them to justice.

programme.title: Thirumanam
programme.desc: Santhosh marries Janani against his will in order to fulfil his parents' wish. However, she believes that they will lead a happy life but soon finds out that her husband loves another woman.

programme.title: 8 Thottakkal
programme.desc: Sathya, an honest policeman, accidentally loses his service pistol while tailing a criminal. However, the thief who stole the pistol sells it to Murthy and he goes on a killing spree.

programme.title: Dhilukku Dhuddu 2
programme.desc: In a bid to escape from Viji's antics, his neighbours lure him to fall in love with Maya. However, everything turns upside down when he realises that a ghost is protecting Maya.

programme.title: Balle Vellayatheva
programme.desc: Sakthi moves to a new village after his mother, who is a postmaster, gets transferred. He befriends a childless couple and falls in love with Thanikodi, a butcher's daughter.

programme.title: Taana
programme.desc: A life struggle of a man who's trying to become a policeman as his family members wish and forced him to become police and save their village.

programme.title: Kaadaan
programme.desc: The bond between humans and elephants with Bandevs story as he fights for the protection of his ele-friends.

programme.title: Kaaviya Thalaivan
programme.desc: Two rival artists at Sivadas Swamigal's drama troupe compete in everything they do. While one of them goes on to become successful, the other fails in life.

programme.title: Oh My Kadavule
programme.desc: Two childhood friends, Anu and Arjun, decide to get married. However, their marital life becomes complicated due to misunderstandings and miscommunications.

programme.title: Kodi Veeran
programme.desc: Kodiveeran, who enjoys a god-like stature in his village, sets out to protect his family as he battles Villangam and Adhigaaram, who pose a threat to his brother-in-law's life.

programme.title: Maniyar Kudumbam
programme.desc: Kutti Maniyar, who belongs to a wealthy family, avoids working and lives off his inherited money and property. However, he decides to turn over a new leaf when he falls in love.

programme.title: Nadigayar Thilagam
programme.desc: Biography of Savitri, an actress from South India movie industry, who ruled the industry for two decades during 50s and 60s.

programme.title: Endrendrum Punnagai
programme.desc: Goutham grows up hating women after his mother abandons him during his childhood. Though he decides to stay single while his friends marry, Priya changes his mind about singlehood.

programme.title: Desingu Raja
programme.desc: A love story with boy and girl from feuding villages.

programme.title: Anandham Vilayadum Veedu
programme.desc: While Muthupandi and Kaasi, two half-brothers, lead harmonious lives with their large families, their formidable unity is threatened by the evil scheme of an old nemesis.

programme.title: Veerame Vaagai Soodum
programme.desc: A normal man from a middle-class family questioning the authorities for abusing their powers.

programme.title: Kavan
programme.desc: A reporter along with his girlfriend joins hands with young social activists to fight against a factory whose chemical emissions greatly damage a village.

programme.title: Akhanda
programme.desc: Balakrishna plays a fierce devotee of Lord Shiva, who stands tall against evildoers.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep36
programme.desc: The series revolves around the adventures of Tapu and The Gokuldham Society, and if something wrong happens, Tapu and his friends solve the problems.

programme.title: Hagola Ep39
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Imtihan
programme.desc: Vicky, a popular singer, meets and falls in love with Preeti, who does not reciprocate his feelings but agrees to marry him. Soon, he realises that she is hiding something about her past.

programme.title: One By Two

programme.title: Ek Aur Bol Bachchan
programme.desc: Rehman and his sister move to Bheemarajapuram, where a local landlord employs him at his house. He introduces himself as Ram but later has to face severe trouble to keep up this lie.

programme.title: Mary Kom
programme.desc: When Mary Kom encounters a renowned coach in a boxing gym, she shares her boxing aspirations with him and convinces him to teach her. Despite her father's disapproval, she follows her passion.

programme.title: Lailaa O Lailaa
programme.desc: Jai, special investigative agent, falls in love with Anjali and marries her. When he struggles to get hold of Victor Rana, a terrorist on the loose, he asks his wife for her help.

programme.title: Paheli
programme.desc: A ghost falls in love with a newly-wed woman. To be closer to her, he follows her and takes on the guise of her husband while the latter is away on business.

programme.title: Paheli

programme.title: The Fighter Mard No. 1
programme.desc: An honest police officer, Prabhakaran, puts a notorious gangster, Easwaramoorthy, behind bars. When Easwaramoorthy learns of his identity, he decides to take revenge by targeting Prabhakaran's sister.

programme.title: Fauladi Policewala

programme.title: Heroes

programme.title: Clay Pit
programme.desc: It’s the 90s in Russia. Mila has returned home to a remote Russian town after failing to “make it in Moscow” while her sister is about to wed Rustam, a charming young man. But when Rustam becomes the centre of conflicting passions, terrible chaos ensues.

programme.title: Ghost Town Anthology
programme.desc: Set in a small town in Quebec, the film centres on the inhabitants of the town who are struggling to cope after teenager Simon Dubé is killed in a car accident. As the family and town grieve, the residents begin to report several ghost sightings.

programme.title: The Boss And The Cutie

programme.title: Murders In Brouage

programme.title: The Golden Dream
programme.desc: Juan, Sara and Samuel, all 15 years old, flee from Guatemala towards the USA. On their journey through Mexico they meet Chauk, a Tzotzil indian who does not speak Spanish and has no official documents. They believe they will find a better world beyond the USA-Mexico border but they run into a harsh reality.

programme.title: Love and Mazel Tov
programme.desc: In a bid to impress Anne, the attractive Jewish bookstore owner, Daniel pretended to be Jewish. As the lie gets out of hand, he can only hope she will continue to love him when the truth is inevitably revealed.

programme.title: Everything's Gonna Be Alright
programme.desc: Bruno is an unsuccessful director who has just separated from Anna, with whom he had two children. When he is diagnosed with Leukemia, he must find a compatible stem cell donor. His father reluctantly reveals a secret which could give a new hope to Bruno.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Return

programme.desc: 30-year-old construction worker Erik suddenly finds himself a single parent when his ex-girlfriend, whom he hasn’t seen for six months, has a baby girl and informs him that she’ll put the child up for adoption unless he wants to take care of his daughter.

programme.title: Zero Bridge
programme.desc: Dilawar, a rebellious teenager who lives in Kashmir, wants to escape to Delhi for a better life. One fateful day, he pickpockets from Bani, a young lady who has just left America. An unlikely friendship blossoms and their lives are to be changed forever.

programme.title: Another Love
programme.desc: After losing her husband Michi in an accident two years ago, physiotherapist Julika starts a relationship with the easy-going bicycle city guide Konstantin. With Konstantin, life is full of lightness and adventure again, but is it really love?

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Golden Fish
programme.desc: A popular Physics teacher is found dead following an experiment gone wrong. Could his death merely be an accident or could it have been a result of foul play? Things become more complicated when a rumour of a teacher-student affair surfaces.

programme.title: All My Loving
programme.desc: Three siblings, Stefan, Julia and Tobias, all reach crossroads in their lives, where something must change before the rest of their lives begin. Through chaos, mistakes, and insecurities, they search for a path to happiness.

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: Giuseppe is a priest who’s replacing the bishop of a small town near Naples. He is given the dangerous task of prohibiting the illegal dumping of industrial waste by the mafia. But his spiritual faith is tested as the dangers of his task start mounting.

programme.title: Irina
programme.desc: Stuck in poverty and desperate to make ends meet, Irina decides to become a surrogate mother. As the baby grows inside her, she must accept that she will have to part with it forever, and she discovers what it means to love and forgive.

programme.title: Jeune Juliette
programme.desc: In this bubbly teenage drama, Juliette is a high school sophomore who has big dreams about friends, love and family. However, as each dream fails to materialise despite her best efforts, she learns to let go and find peace with who she really is

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: In this black comedy, a sanatorium isolated in the mountains becomes a microcosm of Kyrgyzstan; its residents comprise of a tourist, a TV host, a pervert, Chinese businessmen and drugged-up youths. Excised in linear time, reality dissolves into fantasy.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Most Beautiful Day
programme.desc: As the tide off Sylt starts to recede, a car emerges with a dead man behind the wheel. The driver, Stefan, did not drown. He was poisoned. Stefan was a wedding videographer, but he also had a very lucrative side business – blackmailing brides and grooms.

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: Ramon, an anti-bullying advocate, returns to his alma mater to give a talk on bullying. There, he recounts his past experiences with bullying, which still haunt him to this day.

programme.title: Patchwork Family
programme.desc: Christian is a divorced father who can only see his young daughter Vanessa every other weekend. When he meets the single mother Christine and decides to participate in a summer TV show, his whole life is turned upside down.

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 5
programme.desc: You have the right to remain stupid! TruTV brings you 20 of the dumbest outlaws ever to fight the law and lose. This perp walk includes a drunk driving squirrel, nude news crasher, grand theft puppy, and a stick-up woman whose bra is packing. Takingthese criminals to task is our celebrity cast, including Frank Stallone, Tonya Harding, Jared Logan, and Kevin McCaffrey.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 6
programme.desc: Knuckleheads, start your engines! TruTV is hitting the road with 20 of the dumbest motorheads ever to ignore traffic laws. You'll see a passed out pilot, road rage rants, a nearly-too-hot-for-TV motorcycle ride, and a mail truck that delivers a hit.Keeping the show on the road is our celebrity cast, including Danny Bonaduce, Leif Garrett, Mike Trainor, and Chris Fairbanks.

programme.title: Cop Out
programme.desc: Bruce Willis and 30 Rock's Tracy Morgan star as two longtime NYPD partners on the trail of a stolen, rare, mint-condition baseball card in the first major studio project from cult independent filmmaker Kevin Smith (Clerks, Chasing Amy). Willis plays the veteran detective whose missing collectible is his only hope to pay for his daughter's upcoming wedding, and Morgan is his "partner-against-crime." The two cops find themselves tangling with a merciless, memorabilia-obsessed gangster, rescuing a Mexican beauty with the key to millions in laundered drug money, and everything else that's not in a day's work for the detective duo.

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: What was Mark Whitacre thinking? A rising star at agri-industry giant Archer Daniels Midland (ADM), Whitacre suddenly turns whistleblower. Even as he exposes his company's multi-national price-fixing conspiracy to the FBI, Whitacre envisions himself being hailed as a hero of the common man and handed a promotion. But before all that can happen, the FBI needs evidence, so Whitacre eagerly agrees to wear a wire and carry a hidden tape recorder in his briefcase, imagining himself as a kind of de facto secret agent. Unfortunately for the FBI, their lead witness hasn't been quite so forthcoming about helping himself to the corporate coffers. Whitacre's ever-changing account frustrates the agents and threatens the case against ADM as it becomes almost impossible to decipher what is real and what is the product of Whitacre's rambling imagination. Based on the true story of the highest-ranking corporate whistleblower in U.S. history.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep187
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.title: Diplomat Talks Ep117
programme.desc: Diplomats residing in South Korea have prepared special stories to share and have extended their invitations to viewers around the world. Through in-depth conversations with ambassadors who are at the center of global discussions, viewers can learn about near, but far neighboring countries, as well as the rest of the multicultural nations co-existing on our planet. "Diplomat Talks" will be sharing stories from ambassadors, never been told before, with its viewers around the world.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep1
programme.desc: The Journey Begins - The journey begins as 12 dance teams, each comprised of one extremely talented kid dancer and their untrained parent, enter the competition of a lifetime on the two-hour series premiere.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep2
programme.desc: Pop Night - After Maceo’s dad, Albert, injured himself in the premiere episode, host Philip Lawrence declared all 12 teams safe from elimination, making this week’s “Pop Night” the first emotional goodbye of the season.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep3
programme.desc: Bust A Groove Night, Part 1 - The stakes are at an all-time high when each kid is tasked with teaching their parent three dance moves that they must incorporate into their performance.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep4
programme.desc: Bust A Groove Night, Part 2 - The second wave of five kids tasks their dance partners with learning three new moves that they must pull off during their performances. The five remaining teams perform dance routines on part two of a two-part episode.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep5
programme.desc: Picture This - Emotions are at an all-time high as each team performs a routine inspired by a photo that represents their relationship.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep6
programme.desc: #Throwback - Each of the final eight teams chooses their favorite era to inspire the creation of an original performance. From ancient Egypt through present day, teams are pushed out of their comfort zones as they perform routines to songs.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep7
programme.desc: Musical Magic - Drawing inspiration from their favorite musicals, each dance team is faced with the daunting task of showcasing their theatrical skills. Seven parent-kid teams remain in the competition as they perform dance routines to hit musical songs.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep8
programme.desc: Jet Setters - Six teams perform dances inspired by their dream destinations, and one team makes history when they receive the first-ever perfect score in the competition.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep9
programme.desc: Heroes Night - Each team is tasked with creating their own superhero power as they battle their way through difficult dance routines, in hopes of advancing to the semi-final. The talented kids and their untrained parents perform routines to hits.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep10
programme.desc: Semi-Final - The four remaining teams dance not once, but twice to prove they have what it takes to advance to the grand finale. The final four perform routines to top songs.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep11
programme.desc: Grand Finale - The judges and choreographers kick off the show’s season finale with an epic dance, then the three final kid-parent teams perform encores of the judges’ favorite routines from the season with the winning duo taking home the $100,000 grand prize!

programme.desc: Con Artists - Chris reveals the intelligent cons and deceitful behaviour that Animal Einsteins use to survive and prosper in the game of life - from disguising themselves to outwit predators, and kidnapping babies to save their own offspring, to reading our body language.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Ghost of the Reef - Off the coast of Tanzania lurks a fish so violent it is known to ram sharks to death and even attack humans. Cyril explores the area with some local fishermen.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep25
programme.desc: This episode looks at how packaged rice, Caesar salad, apple pies and gluten-free multi-grain English muffins are made on a large scale.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep26
programme.desc: This episode looks at how hot sauce, 'Shredded Wheat', coffee-chocolate bars and hard-boiled eggs are made on a large scale.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ho Chi Minh to Hoi An - Michael Portillo boards Vietnam's spectacular Reunification Railway to make a 1,000-mile journey from Ho Chi Minh City to Hanoi. He visits the container port of Haiphong and finishes in Halong Bay.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep2

programme.title: Wild China S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Land of The Panda - With splendour, scale and romance, Wild China lifts the veil on the world's most enigmatic and magnificent country, delving into its vibrant habitats to reveal a land of unbelievable natural complexity. Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

programme.desc: Canada, where summer is short and time is tight – any time is the right time to fight. The mighty North provides the setting for bison, bald eagles, and polar bears to wage some of the most heavy-duty fighting in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 - Sweeping Shores Ep1
programme.desc: The African intertidal zone is home to a unique universe of plants and creatures. Here, life has adapted to survive in a challenging marine environment - some species are able to live on exposed rocks, while others prefer the shelter of rock pools.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - The Drought Begins Ep1
programme.desc: The Luangwa Valley in Zambia experiences one of the toughest dry seasons imaginable. Seven months with no rain and spiraling temperatures. And with this year’s El Nino conditions the drought is threatening to be even more intense than usual.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - Life in the Furnace Ep2

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - The Coming of the Rains Ep3

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.desc: While all marsupials share similarities, it is some of the rare smaller marsupials that highlight the fascinating contrast between them - and few small marsupials highlight these innate differences better than the quokkas and the quolls.

programme.desc: From the Amazon to the Andes, South America has some beautiful scenery. From guanacos sparring over grassland, to marine iguanas head-butting over a beachhead, to home-stealing hermit crabs, the quest for real estate causes a lot of conflict.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - The Drought Begins Ep1
programme.desc: The Luangwa Valley in Zambia experiences one of the toughest dry seasons imaginable. Seven months with no rain and spiraling temperatures. And with this year’s El Nino conditions the drought is threatening to be even more intense than usual.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - Life in the Furnace Ep2
programme.desc: It’s October in Zambia’s Luangwa Valley. The hottest and harshest time of year. But this year dry season conditions are exacerbated by a global El Niño event… the Valley is in the throes of drought. There’s been no rain since April and desperate animals a

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Southeast Asia Ep8
programme.desc: With real-life dueling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill – on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brought Back from the Brink Ep1
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - A Koala Called Cavendish Ep2
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spiky and Stinky Ep3
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of Mini Marsupials Ep5

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - USA Ep9
programme.desc: The USA is big on flash and spectacle. Bighorn rams rattle the mountaintops. Brown bears battle, desperate to fatten up for winter. Sharp-tailed grouse shake their tail-feathers on the dance floor. Wild stallions rumble with beauty and grace.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Europe Ep10
programme.desc: From the Highlands to the Alps, Europe’s evocative landscapes are the backdrop for epic wildlife drama. Normally stoic red deer go wild during the rut. Wolf packs clash over territory, and foxes do the foxtrot - it’s not as nice as it sounds.

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 - Sanctuary of the Indian Ocean Ep2

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - The Big Bend Ep2

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - Ebony Plain Ep3

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life Begins Ep1

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life's Lessons Ep2
programme.desc: If young animals survive until adulthood, the chances for survival are greatly increased - but many challenges face them before they can strike out on their own. Some have months to grow-up; other have decades – but all, have lots to learn along the way.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 - Life's Legacies Ep3

programme.desc: Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africa’s most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.desc: Baritone Tea Part 1 / Baritone Tea Part 2 - Uh, oh — Archibald accidentally drinks all of Finly's vocal-enhancing tea on the eve of his brother's big concert!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep21
programme.desc: Grug V Gurg/Unfair Fair - Grug wants a day off from his honey-do-list so he subs in doppelganger Gurg/Eep and Thunk set out to sabotage Bulk and Sulk's "idea fair" project because they always win even though Snoot comes up with the ideas.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Lucky And The Lion - When a mountain lion is spotted in Miradero, no one is safe!

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever Ep20
programme.desc: The Cheer Hunter / Dot'S Entertainment - Zoe invites Lotta to join her cheer squad and Audrey gets jealous. Dot becomes obsessed with making people laugh after telling her first joke.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep20
programme.desc: Zoo-Lander / Balloonatics - Shadow and Skidmark embark on a perilous adventure through the zoo to rescue Deuce.//Whiplash attempts to keep the crew from meeting his parents.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Puff Enuf - The Riders find a Puffertail and train her to join the family. She struggles to learn but soon finds herself with a chance to make a big rescue.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Baritone Tea Part 1 / Baritone Tea Part 2 - Uh, oh — Archibald accidentally drinks all of Finly's vocal-enhancing tea on the eve of his brother's big concert!

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep20
programme.desc: Scared Crazy / Superslushious - Tip and Oh go camping but soon learn about a crazy Boov who scares everyone; Oh upgrades Slushious to “Superslushious” things get out of hand.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep20
programme.desc: The Man In The Iron Booty - King Julien sends his entire kingdom away on rafts to help an alleged fellow king who is supposedly in distress.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep20
programme.desc: A Wanderer'S Christmas - Odlulu wants to get off the naughty list so she goes around the world and tries to "help" celebrations. Unfortunately she does the opposite which means Waldo and Wenda need to clean up her mess to reinstate Christmas!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep20
programme.desc: Party Crashed - When the Party Crashers invade Troll Village, they trap Poppy and Branch, party throughout the village, and challenge the Trolls to a dramatic sing-off

programme.title: The Mighty Ones S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creepy Caterpillar/Code Of Silence - When Twig introduces Leaf to his new caterpillar friend Josh, Leaf must overcome his debilitating fear of caterpillars in order to give Josh a chance. / Hot tempered Rabbit is sick of the noise from the Mighty Ones’ games, so he makes them a bet that they can’t go for a whole day without making a sound. Desperate to see them fail, Rabbit spends the entire day making secret attempts to get the Mighty Ones to talk.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep20
programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio De La Niñera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Bizarre Blitzkrieg Of The Bothersome Butt-Erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep20
programme.desc: Squad - Just as Puss is training the orphans to protect San Lorenzo, El Moco storms into town and cat-naps the swashbuckling hero.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep20
programme.desc: The Legends Of The Power Gems: Chapter Three - Rocky and Bullwinkle battle one more guardian to get the final power gem – the wind gem. But they’re soon confronted by a tiny ninja squirrel who comes from a floating city of squirrels in the sky – and she believes that Rocky is the chosen squirrel promised by prophesy

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep20
programme.desc: Snow Way Out - Determined to create a key to the Dragon Eye, Ryker heads to Glacier Island to find the dangerous Snow Wraith being protected by the Dragon Riders

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep20
programme.desc: Space Mall - Team Voltron travels to an intergalactic mall to purchase lenses needed to power the TeleDav
