programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep49
programme.desc: The Case Of The Diabolo - Noddy's delighted to be given a diabolo by Big Ears. But when Noddy tries it out for the first time, the diabolo crashes and breaks in two. Even worse, when Noddy goes to retrieve the two halves, he finds that they're both missing! Noddy needs to investigate. Where is his new toy?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep50
programme.desc: The Case Of The Vanished Trophy - Queen Sparklewings invites the toys to play a game of Catch the Flag at the castle. But when the special trophy goes missing, Noddy has to investigate. Where is the vanished trophy?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep51
programme.desc: The Case Of The Lost Cows - When Train hears cows near the railway tracks, he's worried that he might scare them and he insists on going really slow. Trouble is there's a load of Builders on board who need to get to Brickabuild fast. Noddy decides to investigate. Where are the lost cows?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep52
programme.desc: The Case Of The Burst Tyres - There's a race at the loop-the-loop. Deltoid brings the prize for the winner: a beautiful model of the loop the loop circuit made by Pat Pat and Smartysaurus. All the toys are very excited, but before the race starts the tyres of Deltoid's tribike are burst! Could it be one of the contestants trying to prevent him from winning the race? Noddy needs to find out so that the race can take place.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep23
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Nap Time Story - Topsy is going to read Zebby a naptime story. Raa Raa wants to make the noises to go with the story. But they are all too loud and poor Zebby can't get to sleep. Can Raa Raa find any quiet sleepy noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep24
programme.desc: Go Bananas - Ooo Ooo is having a banana party. Raa Raa and the others have picked masses of lovely bananas, but how are they going to transport them back to Ooo Ooo's in time for the party?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep25
programme.desc: Clangy Bangy Crocky - Crocky has got his foot stuck in a bucket, which makes lots of noise every time he walks. It's great fun making lots of noise at first, but soon Crocky tires of the bucket stuck on his foot. How can Raa Raa and the other jungle animals help Crocky remove the bucket?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep26
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S New Noise - Raa Raa wants to find the perfect noise to partner his friend Huffty in a tune. He hears an amazing new noise but does not know what made it… he sets out on a noisy discovery to find out how to recreate this wonderful new noise.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep49
programme.desc: It'S Go Go Go At Silver Hatch - Murray Walker is visiting Silver Hatch. Mr Carburettor would like him to commentate while the cars put on a stunt display. But Murray has other ideas… he admits he has always dreamed of racing himself. An unlikely candidate makes his dreams come true!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep50
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Heroes - Mr Carburettor's cousin Chubby is coming to Silver hatch as he wants to film his new blockbuster there. Everybody goes all out to prove that it is just the right location for Chubby's new film

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep51
programme.desc: Pc Roary - Roary helps PC Pete keep the track safe on a snowy day.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep52
programme.desc: Winter Breeze - Breeze is visiting the track. The beach is boring in the winter as nobody comes to visit. She tries her best to help everyone get ready for the winter festival but doesn't seem to be good at anything…

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep25
programme.desc: The Reflesherator / Master Blister - The Reflesherator When Professor Burns requires a substitute teacher, Flyboy's dad volunteers for the job. Master Blister The students of Scare School are thrilled after a prank played on Alder and Dash results in their firing.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep26
programme.desc: Casper The Match Maker / Jimmy Bradley: Creature Catcher - Casper, the Match Maker When Frankengymteacher gets extra crabby, the kids realize he's secretly in love with their history teacher, Hedy. Jimmy Bradley: Creature Catcher On “take your kid to work day,” Jimmy's dad invites him to tag along as a junior ghost catcher.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep7
programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Turbos / The Escargot Affair - Turbo is surprised to learn that somebody in town is pretending to be him and must find the imposter before they can cause more trouble. // Turbo is invited to a fancy dinner party in his honor but learns that he is actually on the menu, so it's up to the crew to save him.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep7
programme.desc: Desert - Under orders from D-Structs, Scrappit steals one of Garby's parts, leading the Dinotrux on a trek through the desert to find help for their friend.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep7
programme.desc: A Wanderer In Paris - Odlulu has a magical shrinking key in France and has set her sights on the Great Race. Wally and Wenda help local racer Jacques after Odlulu shrunk his and everyone else's bikes.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep7
programme.desc: He Blinded Me With Science - Julien teams up with Timo, the tenrec, a scientist who the King elists to automate everything in the kingdom.

programme.desc: Eep-Over/Thunkytown - When Eep has the first-ever sleepover, scary noises and shadows send the girls screaming out of the cave; Thunk saves the day when Bear Owls invade.

programme.desc: The Gray Matter / Fever Break - Oh and Tip discover an underground cult living in the sewers./While Tip is home with a fever, she witnesses a crime committed by her scheming neighbor, Donny.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep1
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Pockets - Pat-Pat wants to play detective for the day with Noddy, but the only problem is that they don't have a case to solve... that is until the Pockets go missing. Where can they be? It's up to Noddy and Pat Pat to investigate!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Cabbage Monster - When Farmer Tom's cabbages go missing, Pat-Pat thinks there must be a cabbage monster on the loose! Noddy's not so sure but then Driver Dylan tells Noddy he's just seen a monster! What if Pat Pat was right? Noddy investigates: where is the cabbage monster?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep3
programme.desc: The Case Of The Runaway Train - Everyone in Toyland is ready to board Train for the 'Big Day Out', but Train runs off down the tracks without any passengers! Why did Train drive away? Noddy investigates to literally save the day.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep4
programme.desc: The Case Of Revs Not Listening - Noddy's excitedly looking forward to his first ever go at driving Train. But then Revs starts playing up and won't listen when Noddy asks him to stop. Why is Revs not listening to him? A puzzled Noddy investigates to find out what's wrong with his friend.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep27
programme.desc: Crocky'S Wobbly Tooth - Crocky has got a wobbly tooth. He really wants it to fall out. He and his friends try all sorts of different ways to try and help the tooth fall out… will any of them work?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep28
programme.desc: Littlest Laugh - Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo are trying to find out who is the funniest animal in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. But they soon realise that they are much funnier when they are together.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep29
programme.desc: Hide And Toot - The animals are playing hide and seek. Huffty gets upset when his trunk keeps giving him away. Can Raa Raa and his friends show the little elephant that his trunk is really rather wonderful?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep30
programme.desc: Boing Boing - Raa Raa has got a new pogo stick. He is having a great time bouncing around, but his friends aren't so sure… he seems to be causing rather a lot of damage. Is there any way Raa Raa can practise without destroying their jungle home?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep1
programme.desc: Flash The Marshall - Mr Carburettor is going to ban Flash from Silver hatch unless he learns how to do something useful. Can Flash learn how to be a good marshal in time?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Sleeping Like a Baby - Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep721
programme.desc: Pups Save a Trash-Dinger / Pups Save the Royal Armor - Mayor Humdinger's trash-compacting truck is messing up the beach. It's up to Rocky's new Re-Use It Truck to help save a rescue! // Gift for the Princess been scattered all over town. It's up to Rocky's Re-Use It Truck to put her gifts back together!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets - Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Helicopter - Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Baby Alexander - Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep177
programme.desc: The Funny Photo - While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep178
programme.desc: The Gift Box - The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Blue's Big Baking Show - It's a sweet and delicious day at Blue's Bakery, because Josh and Blue are baking bibingka, a cake from the Philippines! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who Blue wants to bake for, and help the Banana Baker collect bananas for her Monkey Muffins!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep824
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies - Wally the Walrus searches all over Adventure Bay for Cap'n Turbot and turns the town upside-down in the process. // Everybody loves Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep721
programme.desc: Pups Save a Trash-Dinger - Mayor Humdinger's trash-compacting truck is messing up the beach. It's up to Rocky's new Re-Use It Truck to help save a rescue!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway / Flow Bros - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'. // When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Satellite flight / Diamond geezer - Everyone is grooving to Stu and Safia's dance song, so the Deer has to stop Steel's satellite from broadcasting hypnotic dance signals.// To impress Lady Fluffpot, Sir Steel tries to get his hands on Jade's precious Rainbow Diamond!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Paddington and the Wardrobe / Paddington Helps with Homework - Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out before he is discovered. // Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Paddington Chooses A Best Friend - Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep609
programme.desc: The Great Pizza Race - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Great Pizza Race! Who will deliver all of their pizzas first and win the coveted Great Pizza Trophy?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Starla's Wild West Birthday - Starla's wild west birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze and AJ catch up and save the cake before it's too late?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Kiko's Song / Return to Merlandia - When the coquís of Isla Encanto stop singing, Santi and crew travel into the rainforest to find out the mystery behind their silence.// The crew return to Merlandia for an underwater fair, but must save the day when the power grid becomes overloaded.

programme.desc: Say Snow Go - No matter how fast he clears the path, it just keeps snowing on a Citizen Po's garden!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep27
programme.desc: The Snow Po - The Kid Po have built a big and impressive Snow Po, but it keeps on blowing over. Can Team Tinpo help?

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep28
programme.desc: Grannies - A game of 'grannies' is fun, until Bluey and Bingo can't agree on one simple question: Can Grannies dance? Now they need to video call Nana to get the answer.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep14
programme.desc: The Accessory Badge - The Squirrels see Duggee accessorising his tie and want to learn how to do it themselves. All of the Squirrels accessorise an item and showcase their goods.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep13
programme.desc: The Mountain Badge - The Squirrels need to rescue Enid when they see her at the top of the Mighty Sugar Bun Mountain.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep12
programme.desc: The Lost Property Badge - The Squirrels lose Tag in the Clubhouse but to find him they're going to have to figure out where the Lost Property room is.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep35
programme.desc: The Blarney Stone, Ireland - Kyan has to use some smooth talking to save the tourists and protect Blarney Castle.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep34
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Stop Those Superweeds - Some fast-growing plants that don't belong on Academy Island are in danger of taking over. Can the Go Jetters stop the superweed from damaging the Academy and Grim HQ?

programme.title: The Numtums (S1) Ep24
programme.desc: Humpty Do's Zoo - Humpty Do decides to open his own zoo and looks for objects to turn into zoo animals.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep85
programme.desc: I Spy - The voice trumpet leads a game of 'I Spy' where the Teletubbies have to spot different colours - purple, green, yellow and red. What or who can they spot with those colours?

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: Hat - Dee encourages a friend to say hat and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep27
programme.desc: The Snow Po - The Kid Po have built a big and impressive Snow Po, but it keeps on blowing over. Can Team Tinpo help?

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: It's time to catch the bus - JoJo and Gran Gran miss their bus home, so the pair settle down to wait for the next one. But getting the bus isn't quite as simple as JoJo thinks it is.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep57
programme.desc: Seabed Sleepover - Monty has reservations about attending a sleepover when he realises he will be away from Jimmy Jones. He soon decides it could be good for him and Jimmy to be apart for a while.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep56
programme.desc: Bath Night - Monty is avoiding taking a bath and wonders if you really need to get wet to get clean.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep31
programme.desc: Work - In a game of 'Work', Dad hires Bluey and Bingo at his drainpipe factory. But when Bluey takes charge, Dad finds his new boss pretty tough, especially her no dancing rule.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep20
programme.desc: The Same Badge - As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep19
programme.desc: The Delivery Badge - Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep18
programme.desc: The Eating Badge - The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep39
programme.desc: Funky Fireflies, Selangor River, Malaysia - A trip to see fireflies becomes a rescue when Xuli and Glitch get stuck in a swamp.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep38
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Weather Prediction Predicament - There's a storm brewing after Glitch's fake weather report puts the cadets in danger.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep30
programme.desc: Fairies - Bluey's house has fairies! Tails are being braided, stickers are everywhere, and Mum's got a peg beard. Now the family must band together to hunt for these invisible mischief-makers.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep29
programme.desc: The Creek - Bored of the local playground, Dad and the kids go out bushwalking on a journey to their local creek. Cast out of her comfort zone, Bluey's eyes are opened to the beauty of the natural world.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures (S1) Ep25
programme.desc: Andy and the African Elephants - Andy jets off in his safari-mobile to the river Nile in search of some African elephants.

programme.title: My Pet and Me (S3) Ep20
programme.desc: Luca The Staffie - Rory visits Ryan and his pet dog Luca. Together they find out what Luca likes to eat and drink and where he sleeps.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S4) Ep18
programme.desc: Are We Having Fun Yet? - Captain Captain points out to Gem that there is nothing in the Pirate Handbook about playing games so she has decided that all games are banned!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep17
programme.desc: The Dream Badge - The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep16
programme.desc: The Rainbow Badge - The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep15
programme.desc: The Ambition Badge - Duggee masters his ambition of building a model of the Clubhouse out of sticks. This encourages the Squirrels to think of their own ambitions, and how they can achieve them.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep37
programme.desc: Mars Mission, Chile - Xuli and Foz help NASA after a close encounter with a UFO makes them lose the Mars Rover.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep36
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Around The World In 80 Days - It's a rainy day and the team are stuck inside, so Foz reads them his favourite book: Around the World in 80 Days by Jules Verne. The Go Jetters are soon imagining they are characters from the story.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S15) Ep2
programme.desc: Toby and Bash - Bash is rewarded by the Fat Controller for being a Really Useful Engine. His prize is to spend the day with Toby. Bash enjoys himself so much that Toby thinks his friend would like to live on Sodor.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep20
programme.desc: Old Toys - Duck is bored of his toy collection, so he and Sarah search for old toys in the attic.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep20

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep64
programme.desc: Good Neighbors - Squidward's lazy Sunday is constantly interrupted by Spongebob and Patrick's Good Neighbor Club activities.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Just Be Coo / Tee'd Off - When Sancho gets himself into trouble in the city, Sergio helps him become a model pet! // Worried that Lori may have a new crush, Bobby visits her in college and tries to impress her with his golf skills.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Lalo Land / Maybe-Sitter - The Casagrandes prepare Lalo for his big audition to be Phoebe Powers' new canine sidekick! // With the adults out for the night, Bobby and Carlota take turns watching the kids - and going to a party!

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S02 Ep207
programme.desc: For Wheeler / Brickmuda Heptagon - When Rooky discovers it's Chief Wheeler's birthday, she is determined to make it a memorable. // During the dedication ceremony of the city's deep sea vessel to honor Duke, Freya and Harl, the ship is accidentally set adrift.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Hawk Man / Jammy Good! - Parker meets Mt. Middlemost's resident daredevil, who hung up his "cape" after an extreme jump went wrong. // Ms. Pam creates a sentient jar of jam who wins the hearts and minds of all who dine at the Middlemost Toast.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Clumsy Jeanette - Jeanette is suddenly the clumsiest person on the planet. Is there something wrong with her, or her new glasses?

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Adventures in Babysitting - Theodore gets roped into doing Alvin's babysitting sitting job with a spoiled four year old.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Alvin's Assistant - Kevin agrees to be Alvin's assistant to get closer to the music industry, but ends up running errands instead.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Fair Share / Power Plant - Sharing isn't easy for the twins and after a particularly heated argument they decide split the treehouse in half. // In order to win a local gardening competition, Best attempts to grow a plant, and Bester decides to be a plant.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep120
programme.desc: No Hat for Pat / Toy Store Of Doom - Patrick is sick of all of his friends not being able to play with him because they have to put on their Krusty Krab hats and go to work. // A new toy store has opened up in Bikini Bottom, and SpongeBob and Patrick couldn't be happier!

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Classified - G.H.O.S.T. Special Agent Schloder pursues Twitch after mistaking her for a Decepticon. Meanwhile, Dot is put through G.H.O.S.T. orientation, where she learns that her employer's intentions may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Belles A Ringin' - While buying romance novels for a heartbroken Ellen, Nate discovers they are total cash cows. Under a pen name, he writes a best-selling graphic novel using the people in his life as inspiration until it catches up to him.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Appetite for Destruction / Frame on You - When Lily starts misbehaving at home, Mom and Dad think her new preschool friends might be the cause. // When Rusty is wrongfully suspended, the Action News Team leaps into action to clear his name.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Present Danger / Stressed for the Part - Dressed as David Steele, Lincoln is on the hunt for his stolen birthday present before it's destroyed. // After landing a role in a Dairyland production, Luan must hide this news from Mrs. Bernardo, who she beat out.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep183
programme.desc: Eek, An Urchin! / Squid's Defense - SpongeBob finds a nasty sea urchin living in the Krusty Krab, and tries everything to force it out. // After getting his groceries stolen, Squidward convinces SpongeBob and Sandy to teach him karate.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep132
programme.desc: Yours, Mine and Mine / Kracked Krabs - SpongeBob and Patrick buy a toy and have to learn to share it. // SpongeBob goes with Mr. Krabs to the Cheapest Crab Convention.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Ariel Force One / Itsy Bitsy - When a hot air balloonist crash lands into the Steadfast, the Middlemost Post goes on a journey to help her fix it. // When Parker gives shelter to a spider during a blizzard on the mountain, the cloud learns of Angus's deathly spider fear.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Get the Hump / Sing For Your Supper - It's Best to the rescue when Bester's phobia of camels threatens to de-rail her chances of being dance champ. // Best and Bester go busking, but will Best cope with competition and what happens when burgers and banjos collide?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Don't Zoo That / Maxed Out - Adelaide and Carl battle it out to win Jr. Zookeeper badges but their fighting might ruin both of their chances. // Hector finds out Vito has a huge tab at the mercado and Vito offers to pay him back - no matter what!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Skatey Cat / Weather Beaten - Nervous to jump back on her board after a bad wipeout, will Ronnie Anne ever skate again? feat. Lincoln Loud. // A powerful artifact is coming to the Great Lakes City museum and it brings along a storm for the Casagrandes!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Snack Pact / The Horror-Scope - The family discovers an amazing tamale cart and tries to keep it a secret from Abuela. // Ronnie Anne doesn't believe in an astrological prediction that 'love will find her,' until it seems to come true.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep49
programme.desc: Krab Borg! / Rock A Bi-Valve - After watching a movie where robots take over the world, Spongebob thinks Mr. Krabs is a robot. // Spongebob and Patrick find a baby clam and decide to raise it as their own.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep50
programme.desc: Wet Painters / Krusty Krab Training Video - Spongebob and Patrick must paint Mr. Krabs living room without getting a drop of paint on anything but the walls. // Learn how to become a Krusty Krab employee in this episode.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep42
programme.desc: Club Spongebob / My Pretty Seahorse - Spongebob and Patrick build a small clubhouse in a tree - when Squidward wants to join their club, he literally doesn't "fit" in. // SpongeBob finds a stray sea horse and adopts it.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep43
programme.desc: Just One Bite / The Bully - SpongeBob becomes obsessed with the fact that Squidward has never actually tried a Krabby Patty. // The new bully in school, Flats, threatens to beat SpongeBob up after school.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep120
programme.desc: King Cloud vs. Smogzilla / Ranch on the Side - When a malevolent Smog Cloud terrorizes Mt. Middlemost, it's up to Parker to stop it. // Parker becomes obsessed with ranch dressing.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Parker Gets Rich / Ultimate Fighting Cloud - After winning a raffle, Parker comes into a large sum of money, which Angus warns will come at a cost. // The Middlemost Post discover a secret backyard wrestling league that challenges both their skills and egos.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep226
programme.desc: The Spirit Orbs of Master Ding - When Po is possessed by the ghost of evil Master Ding, it's up to Tigress to save him before Ding can unleash his powers and enslave the Valley of Peace.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Master Ping - While repairs are being made to the noodle shop, Mr. Ping turns the training hall into a restaurant!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep315
programme.desc: The Boiling Rock Part 2 - This episode is continuing the jailbreak from the previous episode. Sokka, Hakoda, Zuko and Suki form a new escape plan, but it is complicated by the arrival of Princess Azula.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep236
programme.desc: I Know Why the Caged Bird Goes Insane - Kowalski's dream of attending the invention expo INVEXPO have to be put on hold when he's laid up with broken legs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Wishful Thinking / April Fools - The penguins are on a mission to fulfill wishes. Private tells Mort that if he throws a penny in the fountain his wish will come true. // King Julien has just discovered April Fools Day. Making up for lost time, he terrorizes the zoo with pranks.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Hello, Dollface / Fit to Print - The toy manufacturer of Rico's doll-girlfriend has upgraded their doll line with a voice chip. // When the penguins are photographed while in action and placed on the new zoo poster they have to stop the presses before the poster gets out.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Thug Loaf / Mine All Mine - When SwaySway and Buhdeuce deliver bread to the bad part of Duck Town, things go from quazy to quazier. // SwaySway and Buhdeuce meet the most righteous dude in the planet: the Bread Maker!

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Season of the Witch - The group arrives at the witch's castle for an epic battle of swords and spells, and a surprise admission from Stacey that shocks her father.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Dorg Wants a Wand / Dorg Has a Nightmare - The gang fix Patronella's old wand, turning her into Patti Perfect. She starts zapping every imperfection in town. // The pineapple man monster from Dorg's nightmares follows him into the real world!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Green-Eyed Monster / Nobody's Purrfect - Miguel invites Chippy, a cute chipmunk-like creature, to join him and Felicity on their friend-iversary, but Chippy isn't all she seems! // Felicity tries a little too hard to be purr-fect and somehow loses both her powers and her confidence.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Hot Sauce Boss / Ghost Pool - When Chicken Chuck adds his own sauce to Penny’s hot wings, a heated competition erupts between the longtime friends. // The kids go on a quest to find a legendary pool in the forest.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Charmed and Dangerous / Science Unfair - Ollie and his friends save VP Magna from beautiful monster Buene Brillo, who pursues him for his good looks. // Ollie summons a monster, in hopes of helping Bernie impress Mr. Pandey with his robot at the Science Fair.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Total Recall / Refill Madness - Fanboy and Chum Chum love their new toy, despite the fact that it has some strange, and painful, features. // Lenny and Boog learn that Fanboy and Chum Chum have a cup that entitles them to endless free refills at the Frosty Mart.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Forget Me Mutt / Mind Trap - Dudley is the only T.U.F.F. agent who overhears Snaptrap’s latest diabolical plan. But then he gets kind of crazy. // Dudley, Kitty, and Keswick try on a mind-reading helmet and hear, what Chief is thinking about them.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep613
programme.desc: The Fairy Godmother - Reunited on Gardenia, the Winx travel to the Forest of Flowers to find the Fairy Godmother Eldora. Eldora tells them the story of the Legendarium, but is interrupted by evil, spiritual creatures.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Mythix - When the Winx rescue student fairies of Tir Nan Og from an attack by the Trix, they prove themselves worthy of receiving magic wands, transforming into Mythix Fairies and entering the Legendarium World.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Mystic Library / The Purple Game - The Turtles plumb the depths of a mysterious hidden library in search of a way to rescue Mayhem. // A competitive new video game has swept New York and Donnie will do anything to reach rank number one.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep224
programme.desc: Squid Noir / Scavenger Pants - When his clarinet goes missing, Squidward must become a hardboiled detective to track it down. // Squidward sends SpongeBob and Patrick on an increasingly difficult scavenger hunt to get them out of his hair.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep225
programme.desc: Cuddle E. Hugs / Pat the Horse - SpongeBob's new friend is a giant fluffy hamster. There's one problem, though: no one else can see him! // Patrick wants to be a horse!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep226
programme.desc: Chatterbox Gary / Don't Feed the Clowns - Gary has a pet translation collar, and he's talking up a storm. Everyone loves it... except for Squidward! // When a small clown gets left behind by the circus, SpongeBob takes the hapless harlequin under his wing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep21
programme.desc: Your Shoe's Untied / Squid's Day Off - Patrick gets a new pair of shoes, but doesn't know how to tie his laces. // Mr. Krabs takes the day off from the Krusty Krab and puts Squiward in charge.

programme.title: Roger Ep165/Ep166/Ep159/Ep160/Ep169/Ep162/Ep163/Ep164
programme.desc: Verrrrry Funny/Pilot's Licence/Fatou's Back/Lousy Lice/A Tall Order/A Whale Of Debt/Blind As A Pad/Roger's Gone Whacko - Roger tells Fatou a joke and it’s a really stupid joke because Roger can’t tell it right and it’s really embarrassing for Fatou because she really doesn’t dare tell her friend that he is a terrible joke teller. Still, Roger is aware of his shortcomings and is sorry, he knows he blew it. He would like so much to make Fatou laugh with a good joke, kind of like Igor does. So he decides to take joke-telling lessons with Igor, since Igor is apparently the king of jokes. But it backfires, Roger is still way too serious! But still determined to make Fatou laugh at one of his jokes, the alien decides that science is the solution. He invents a laughter ray which accompanies his jokes and it turns out to work pretty well. In fact so well that Irina, who is inadvertently struck by the ray, can’t stop laughing herself...to the point of endangering her life...!

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: Gandhi’s Legacy - Where is India Headed? Part 1 - Mahatma Gandhi was assassinated on the 30 of January, 1948 - his murderer a Hindu fanatic. What remains of those ambitions, today?
